title: Ambani builds on record cricket views with film offerings, draws up payment plans for JioCinema
description: JioCinema, the streaming service of Mukesh Ambanis conglomerate, is planning to release over 100 films and TV series to compete with global companies such as Disney and Netflix in the Indian market. Viewers can watch matches for free until the end of the Indian Premier League cricket next month. However, pricing strategy is still being finalised before it starts charging for content. JioCinemas expansion aims to offer a range of Indian language films and series in genres including biopics, romantic and thriller, to lure viewers in expanding internet access and a growing middle class.
